Address.label: Address
Address.value: 925 NORTH ELDRIDGE PARKWAY, HOUSTON, Texas, 77079, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ConocoPhillips is a U.S.-based independent exploration and production firm. In 2021, it produced 1.0 million barrels per day of oil and natural gas liquids and 3.2 billion cubic feet per day of natural gas, primarily from Alaska and the Lower 48 in the United States and Norway in Europe and several countries in Asia-Pacific and the Middle East. Proven reserves at year-end 2021 were 6.1 billion barrels of oil equivalent.
